data.text: @LouiseMartinCBC It’s so scary right now . Especially with over 300 cases a day!
@Deniseasteele @LouiseMartinCBC Some people travelled to Borden for testing
@LouiseMartinCBC Really cbc and liberal propaganda machine.  Sorry don’t watch it anymore
@Diane05363872 @LouiseMartinCBC Masks are useless.. how do people not see this yet?   We need to get rid of all mandates.  You can do whatever you want to protect yourself.. just lift mandates

@LouiseMartinCBC My children have there first dose and are booked to get the second I haven't sent them back to school and I won't until there at least fully vaccinated. Iam too but I've had breathing problems in the last few years i hate keeping them home but what else can I do?
@LouiseMartinCBC Thanks for doing the work the government should be doing, but won’t anymore.
@leets05 @LouiseMartinCBC Lucky for you, what is said in French is basically what was said in English. They always ask her to translate what she said in English.
@LouiseMartinCBC Wow. Her silence speaks volumes. Thanks for asking @LouiseMartinCBC. We appreciate you.
@LouiseMartinCBC Can you ask her what she and @dennyking are doing to combat numbers like this? PEI is the second worst jurisdiction for Covid in Canada. https://t.co/GhojoQCMqu
